title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1805.3 - Filing of HUD documents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1805.3 - Filing of HUD documents

State Regulations

Each municipality or Municipal Urban Renewal Agency, as
the case may be, shall file with the commissioner one copy of each of the
documents and respective exhibits thereto, set forth in section
1805.7, simultaneously with the
transmittal of such documents and their exhibits to HUD. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1805.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
